Comment: If only you tried hg, too…

Author: Phil
Comment: I’m slightly interested by hg but it doesn’t seem to have gained quite enough ground to take the time with. I realise that makes it a chicken and egg situtation but I only have finite time!

Author: Mike Nolan
Comment: If you don’t have enough time you’re obviously sleeping too much.

Author: Phil
Comment: Actually I’ve been using bzr for a couple of projects again recently, and it really is much easier than git. Ideally I’d be pushing my code back to a central repository like github, if only just for advertising and network effects, but I can lose that provided I can actually, you know, work more easily.
